title: Trainning Error? Dont see trainning on console
body:
While im trainning can't see train results on console, always:

 [0/300000] Train loss: 4.26103, Valid loss: 3.05733, Elapsed_time: 1.09714.

Then when it end ,just say end the training.
Thats normal?
Im not using default characters, thats why batch_ratio, select_data, and low accuracy
attached file with console output

Thanks for nice repo :)
